source: ❌ Source Code Issue: The provided device/vendor trees or kernel source are incomplete, inaccessible, or do not meet our standards.
ownership: ❌ Device Ownership: We require maintainers to physically own the device. Proof of ownership was insufficient.
history: ❌ Maintainer History: Your maintenance history or activity levels do not meet our current requirements.
quality: ❌ Quality Standards: The ROM stability or provided builds do not meet AfterlifeOS quality criteria.
duplicate: ❌ Device Taken: This device already has an active maintainer. We are not looking for a co-maintainer at this time.
other: ❌ Application Declined: Thank you for your interest, but we cannot accept your application at this time.
